item.title: Monday.2003.07.28.23:32:52
item.description: Maybe that's why the alleged cruising incident happened -- I looked so hot, even a straight guy wanted to sleep with me. Ha!

item.description: Interesting. Here I've been thinking about taking up guitar lessons again, and what should happen today at the store? My guitar teacher is in line and spots me behind the register. I'm amazed after two years he still remembered my name. (I guess I was an all right student.) I...

item.title: Friday.2003.07.25.23:39
item.description: I'm having fun with writing testimonials on Friendster. Most of them consist of inside jokes, but that doesn't stop me from sharing them here. It's a challenge trying to write something that could be construed as flattery without having to sacrifice wit. She's tangy -- not bitter. Omar is not...

item.title: Thursday.2003.07.24.23:52
item.description: Um. I got an entry, but it's still in the works. It's pretty incoherent, and it may end up being a secret entry. (Haven't seen those in a long time, have you?) I suggest you read the latest Agonippe update instead. Update: Saturday.2003.07.26.23:02 Yup. It is indeed a secret entry....

item.title: Monday.2003.07.21.22:29
item.description: Little by little, they straggle in. The blues musicians on a Sunday evening. The restaurant is nearly deserted, the dinner rush nowhere near starting. She and I were probably the only lay people in the audience -- everyone else was carrying instruments. Guitar cases. Drumsticks. Harmonicas. Slowly but surely, the...

item.title: Sunday.2003.07.20.23:55
item.description: I met with Gay Friend-Drinking Buddy this past Saturday. Yeah. I can scarcely believe I'm typing that sentence myself. It's been four years since we've actually talked face-to-face. He's e-mailed me about once-a-year, and we'll have a brief exchange. But that's pretty much it. Last week, he sent a message...

item.title: Friday.2003.06.27.22:45
item.description: So. The Supreme Court has ruled Texas sodomy laws as unconstitutional. This is a galvanizing victory for conservative ideology nationwide.
